com.google.android.exoplayer2.ext.ima

Class ImaAdsMediaSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.BaseMediaSource
      • com.google.android.exoplayer2.ext.ima.ImaAdsMediaSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.MediaSource, com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.MediaSource.SourceInfoRefreshListener
    Deprecated. 
    Use com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.ads.AdsMediaSource with ImaAdsLoader.

    @Deprecated
public final class ImaAdsMediaSource
extends com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.BaseMediaSource
implements com.google.android.exoplayer2.source.MediaSource.SourceInfoRefreshListener
    A MediaSource that inserts ads linearly with a provided content media source.

        Deprecated. 
        Constructs a new source that inserts ads linearly with the content specified by contentMediaSource.
        Parameters:
        contentMediaSource - The MediaSource providing the content to play.
        dataSourceFactory - Factory for data sources used to load ad media.
        imaAdsLoader - The loader for ads.
        adUiViewGroup - A ViewGroup on top of the player that will show any ad UI.

      • ImaAdsMediaSource

        Constructs a new source that inserts ads linearly with the content specified by contentMediaSource.
        Parameters:
        contentMediaSource - The MediaSource providing the content to play.
        dataSourceFactory - Factory for data sources used to load ad media.
        imaAdsLoader - The loader for ads.
        adUiViewGroup - A ViewGroup on top of the player that will show any ad UI.
        eventHandler - A handler for events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
        eventListener - A listener of events. May be null if delivery of events is not required.
